snippet.title: Flat Eye - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a look at Flat Eye in this reveal trailer for the upcoming narrative-driven and resource management simulation game that's headed to PC in 2022. Take a tour of the automobile fill-up station and technological access point and learn about some of the strange services available.

Flat Eye is set in a very possible near future that plays with the personal stories of your returning customers.

As the manager of Flat Eye, a subsidiary of the Eye Life Corporation, you'll optimize your products and services based on Flat Eye intuitive shopping algorithms. Use your funds to upgrade the store in response to global events to better serve the desires of your loyal customers and unlock a variety of branching narrative paths.
